column2: Today, "the United States is the most respected country on Earth."
column4: Today, "the United States is the most respected country on Earth."

column2: America is a nation of builders. We built the Empire State Building in just one year. Isnt it a disgrace that it can now take 10 years just to get a minor permit approved for the building of a simple road?
column4: America is a nation of builders. We built the Empire State Building in just one year. Isnt it a disgrace that it can now take 10 years just to get a minor permit approved for the building of a simple road?

column2: Anywhere in the world, when someone uses a mobile phone, email, the Internet or GPS, they are enjoying the benefits of the American miracle.
column4: Anywhere in the world, when someone uses a mobile phone, email, the Internet or GPS, they are enjoying the benefits of the American miracle.

column2: The United States of America, right now, has the strongest, most durable economy in the world.
column4: The United States of America, right now, has the strongest, most durable economy in the world.

column2: Yesterday we had the strongest dollar in the history of our country.
column4: Yesterday we had the strongest dollar in the history of our country.

column2: Business spirit is the highest it's ever been, according to polls.
column4: Business spirit is the highest it's ever been, according to polls.

column2: Consumer confidence, business confidence, and manufacturing confidence are the highest they have been in many decades.
column4: Consumer confidence, business confidence, and manufacturing confidence are the highest they have been in many decades.

column2: My first order as president was to renovate and modernize our nuclear arsenal. It is now far stronger and more powerful than ever before.
column4: My first order as president was to renovate and modernize our nuclear arsenal. It is now far stronger and more powerful than ever before.

column2: Even our nuclear arsenal doesn't work. It came out recently they have equipment that is 30 years old. They don't know if it worked.
column4: Even our nuclear arsenal doesn't work. It came out recently they have equipment that is 30 years old. They don't know if it worked.

column2: The sequester "wont consider whether were cutting some bloated program that has outlived its usefulness, or a vital service that Americans depend on every single day. It doesnt make those distinctions."
column4: The sequester "wont consider whether were cutting some bloated program that has outlived its usefulness, or a vital service that Americans depend on every single day. It doesnt make those distinctions."

column2: Due to the sequester, "people are going to be unsafe. Homes are going to burn."
column4: Due to the sequester, "people are going to be unsafe. Homes are going to burn."

column2: If the sequester hits, federal prosecutors will have to "let criminals go."
column4: If the sequester hits, federal prosecutors will have to "let criminals go."

column2: Just last year we gave the military a $700 billion budget increase, which they didnt even ask for.
column4: Just last year we gave the military a $700 billion budget increase, which they didnt even ask for.

column2: Just last year we gave the military a $700 billion budget increase, which they didnt even ask for.
column4: Just last year we gave the military a $700 billion budget increase, which they didnt even ask for.

column2: Under sequestration, the military was cut "down to the smallest Army since 1940, the smallest Navy since 1915."
column4: Under sequestration, the military was cut "down to the smallest Army since 1940, the smallest Navy since 1915."

column2: Says President Obama "is reducing our naval fleet to 1917 levels..."
column4: Says President Obama "is reducing our naval fleet to 1917 levels..."

column2: Barack Obama, right now, No. 1, over seven years has dramatically degraded our military.
column4: Barack Obama, right now, No. 1, over seven years has dramatically degraded our military.

column2: The United States is "about to have the smallest Army since before WWII, the smallest Navy since WWI and the smallest Air Force ever."
column4: The United States is "about to have the smallest Army since before WWII, the smallest Navy since WWI and the smallest Air Force ever."

column2: The U.S. military is at risk of losing its "military superiority" because "our Navy is smaller than it's been since 1917. Our Air Force is smaller and older than any time since 1947."
column4: The U.S. military is at risk of losing its "military superiority" because "our Navy is smaller than it's been since 1917. Our Air Force is smaller and older than any time since 1947."

column2: Our Navy has shrunk from more than 500 ships in 1991 to 275 in 2016.
column4: Our Navy has shrunk from more than 500 ships in 1991 to 275 in 2016.

column2: President Trump proposed the increase to $700 billion to our military budget, which included the 355ship Navy, which included a military pay increase, a modest one, which included, a yet even more modest housing allowance, but yet (Sen. Tim Kaine) even voted against giving more money to our men and women who are in the military service and against our housing allowance.
column4: President Trump proposed the increase to $700 billion to our military budget, which included the 355ship Navy, which included a military pay increase, a modest one, which included, a yet even more modest housing allowance, but yet (Sen. Tim Kaine) even voted against giving more money to our men and women who are in the military service and against our housing allowance.

column2: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
column4: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."

column2: Says troops recently received "one of the biggest pay raises" ever, and that it was the first pay increase in "more than 10 years."
column4: Says troops recently received "one of the biggest pay raises" ever, and that it was the first pay increase in "more than 10 years."

column2: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
column4: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."

column4: The National Defense Authorization Act for fiscal year 2019 "includes the largest pay raise in nearly 10 years."

column4: Says Republicans"just passed" the Veterans Choice program after 44 years of trying. "They've been trying to pass that one for many, many decades."

column2: American aluminum and steel "are vital to our national security. ... They are the bedrock of our defense industrial base."
column4: American aluminum and steel "are vital to our national security. ... They are the bedrock of our defense industrial base."

column2: All across Ohio, steel mills are reopening.
column4: All across Ohio, steel mills are reopening.

column2: Electrolux, Sweden's largest appliance maker, has just abandoned a $250 million investment in the United States because of the steel tariffs. That is retaliation.
column4: Electrolux, Sweden's largest appliance maker, has just abandoned a $250 million investment in the United States because of the steel tariffs. That is retaliation.

column2: Says the U.S. steel and aluminum industry is "a fraction of what it once was."
column4: Says the U.S. steel and aluminum industry is "a fraction of what it once was."

column2: Tariffs are "paid for mostly by China, by the way, not by us."
column4: Tariffs are "paid for mostly by China, by the way, not by us."

column2: This is the most generous country in the world when it comes to immigration. There are a million people a year who legally immigrate to the United States.
column4: This is the most generous country in the world when it comes to immigration. There are a million people a year who legally immigrate to the United States.
